channel.title: "WildCoins" Question
channel.description:
ok i got a new comp and it came with games i can play the full version but only 6 times heres a pic of it
[img]http://img247.imageshack.us/img247/7699/wildcoinpo2.jpg[/img]
now once i click play i will only have 5 coins left, does anybody know a way to get unlimited coins for free?[br][size=1]Posted on: April 08, 2007, 11:26:23 PM[/size][hr]has anyone have an idea of this?

item.title: "WildCoins" Question
item.dc:creator: @mvp566 mvp566
item.description:
@mvp566 wrote:

[quote=“Bebemycat2, post:7, topic:77335”][quote author=PaulT link=topic=113092.msg1128729#msg1128729 date=1176177860]
Is that a little puppy in the picture?
[/quote]
Yeah you get a puppy or a cat to be your “companion” and it fights with you. You can also have it sell stuff for you.

[quote author=mvp566 link=topic=113092.msg1128742#msg1128742 date=1176177962]

I got an Hp also, and I was annoyed that after spending all that money I wasn’t allowed to play those crappy games as much I wanted.
I played fate a few time. Got to level 15 dungeon and said to hell with it. Game gets really boring.

[/quote] i got toshiba lol

Just looked at the picture and it says it right uptop

Hp has the same thing.[/quote]

oh ok… my moms is an HP and it dident come with the wildcoins thing

Read full topic

item.title: "WildCoins" Question
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

I get this feeling that I can just play through Diablo again and have a much better time. Even with the little puppy.

Read full topic
